mapper.select: SELECT * FROM basket WHERE basket_user_no=#{userNo} AND basket_product_no=#{productNo}
SELECT * FROM product_image WHERE product_image_product_no=#{productNo} AND product_thumbnail = 1
SELECT * FROM category ORDER BY category_major_title , category_minor_title
SELECT DISTINCT category_major_title FROM category ORDER BY category_major_title
SELECT category_no FROM category WHERE category_major_title=#{major} AND category_minor_title=#{minor}
SELECT product_no FROM product WHERE product_name = #{productName} AND product_price_normal = #{productPriceNormal} AND product_price_selling = #{productPriceSelling}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, tbl.* FROM ( SELECT i.product_image_product_no, i.product_image_folder, i.product_image_file_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN product_image i ON p.product_no = i.product_image_product_no LEFT JOIN category c ON p.product_category_no = c.category_no LEFT JOIN favorite f ON c.category_no = f.favorite_category_no WHERE i.product_thumbnail = 1 AND f.favorite_user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY p.product_reg_date DESC ) tbl ) b WHERE rn > 0 AND rn <= 9

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, tbl.* FROM ( SELECT i.product_image_folder, i.product_image_file_name, i.product_image_product_no, MAX(b.board_views) board_views FROM product p LEFT JOIN product_image i ON p.product_no = i.product_image_product_no LEFT JOIN category c ON p.product_category_no = c.category_no LEFT JOIN board b ON b.board_category_no = c.category_no WHERE i.product_thumbnail = 1 group by i.product_image_product_no, i.product_image_folder, i.product_image_file_name ORDER BY board_views DESC ) tbl ) WHERE rn > 0 AND rn <= 9
SELECT * FROM duck_order WHERE order_user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY order_no desc
